body.name: Rubber Broom Pet Hair Remover, Fur Remover Broom with Squeegee for Fluff Carpet, Hardwood Floor, Tile, Window, Black White, Includes Portable Lint Remover Brush
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 7 mins
features: 【Rubber Broom Pet Hair Remover】Electrostatic rubber Bristles acts like a magnet to absorb debris and hair, during the cleaning process, debris and hair won't be blown into the air. The rubber broom bristles scrape down and ball the hair from carpets, effectively cleans hair, dirt, fur, dust and other debris on any floor surface.

【Built in Squeegee Edge】Not only remove the hair. The built-in squeegee for cleaning window or spills, works great to wipe away liquid spills on tile, concrete, or any hardwood surface such as patio decks or interior flooring.

【Telescoping Handle】Don't strain your back anymore, the handle length of the pet hair rubber broom is adjustable and can be extended by 27-56 inches. Suitable for people of different heights, it can also be shortened for ease of kids' use.

【Durable & Washable】Pet hair removal broom head is washable, just rinse it with tap water to wash the dirt off the fur. You can also clean it with a cleaning solution. Natural rubber is easy to clean and requires little maintenance, so your broom will last for many years!

【Magic Rubber Broom】Not all pet hair removal products are created equal. When cleaning hair from carpets, the serrated bristles are pulled out and the sharp strokes reach deep into the deepest hairs, bringing the embedded hairs to the surface of the carpet and collecting them. The serrated bristles are easily dislodged from the collected fur, Save a lot of time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this at a dog rescue and I love it. It was easy to put together. The bristle side gently scrubs the tile floors better than anything else I've tried. The best part is the squeegee side. After mopping the floor, I use the squeegee side to get the excess water off the floor. It also helps getting hair off the tile floors.I haven't had any issues with the pole.I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for carpets
reviews.reviewText: Not really for hard floors but it has slots on the topside to wrap a cloth around it to mop your floors. The hand held tool is really useful for furniture. Overall a good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The sweeping power is great for dog hair but the quality of the handle is lacking. The handle bent after 2nd use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great but the stinking pole! Grrr!
reviews.reviewText: I love using this broom because it picks up a ton of stuff, but the freaking pole is awful! It is constantly coming undone at the height adjustment area even though I lock it, and it comes undone from the broom head too. Since I want to be able to take the broom head off to wash it, I don't really want to superglue it, and at the area where you can adjust the height, there's no easy way to superglue it even if I wanted to. I did superglue the hanging end and the two grippy things that you put a microfiber cloth on to mop with (yes, those plastic pieces fell out too when I tried to use them the first time).Besides the horrible pole issues that drive me absolutely bonkers, this broom works incredibly well. I have lots of pets and this picks up fur from my hardwood floors like no one's business. Putting the microfiber cloth on it to damp mop works great too. It works on the low pile throw rug I have in my living room as well to pull out the absolutely shocking amount of fur my animals deposit on it on a daily basis. But the best part of this entire purchase for me is the little mini lint remover brush that came with the broom! My pets adore being brushed with it. Even my Siamese, who hates all brushes loves the little rubber brush that came with this. My dog goes into zen mode when I brush him out. I will be a lifer ordering these brushes for the pets. A+Would I recommend this? Yes, I would. You have to know that you will have to keep tightening some of the joints with the handle, but it really is an effective tool in my furry house. It's worth the bother imo, and the lint remover is an extra perk that I, and my pets, are really happy about!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broke first time using it
reviews.reviewText: First time using the item In my bedroom and the damn handle broke :( put pressure and it bent forward, pretty cheaply made it seems which is unfortunate because I’d bought one a while ago for almost double and it lasted me years. Don’t think it’s worth it, and I’m not going to go out of my way to return it for a new one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Gets the job done. Lightweight and efficient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars this is amazing for pet hair
reviews.reviewText: I hated sweeping my house until now.... always dusty and dust bunnies on the floor. I own 5 dogs and this is now my daily . I use this every evening and there is no dust and it catches all the dog hair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'd love to like it but within a week of having it and using it on my carpet it broke, granted I have kids so I still used it until now the head of it constantly has to be tightened every couple seconds and the handle isn't staying sturdy anymore.
